item.title: House Democrats pick Robert Garcia, 47, to lead them on Oversight Committee
item.description: Garcia is an up-and-coming sophomore from California who promised to usher in a new generation of leadership for Democrats on the committee.

item.title: Congress has tried and failed for two decades to wield its war powers
item.description: For more than two decades Congress has failed at one of its most central constitutional duties: setting the parameters of war for the military.

item.title: Local economies under pressure as ICE crackdowns create climate of fear
item.description: Businesses that serve large immigrant populations are seeing palpable shifts — fewer in-store visits, lower receipts and more deliveries — in consumer...

item.title: Trump heads to NATO, minimizes time as he shrugs off global meetings
item.description: Trump is heading to NATO for a trip lasting barely a day. It’s the pattern of his second term — attend international meetings, but don’t stay long.

item.title: Three years after Roe’s overturn, Democrats less focused on abortion
item.description: The party has largely shifted its attention to other fights, as some acknowledge the difficulty of battling President Donald Trump on the issue.
